cleaned_text: 330 Park Ave Suite #3 Ste 3 Laguna Beach, CA92651(map) About us We are Health in Balance, a beacon of hope, healing and restoration since 1987. Our state-of-the-art, integrative approach combines the best of many health care disciplines including functional medicine, chiropractic kinesiology, physical therapy, massage and nutrition. We are committed to empowering, equipping and partnering with individuals and families alike to relieve pain and achieve a healthy, flourishing lifestyle.
